parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma1

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.08

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value>local

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Locations

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Creates a location of the specified class and dimensions at the specified position. Classes are defined in <tt>CfgLocationTypes</tt>. For possible location types see [[Location#Location Types|Location Types]]. For the actual name text of the location, use [[text]] and [[setText]]

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value>'''createLocation''' [className, position, sizeX, sizeY]

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> [className, position, sizeX, sizeY]: [[Array]]
</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> className: [[String]] - see [[Location#Location Types|Location Types]]
</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> position: [[Position2D]], [[Position3D]] or [[Object]]
</value></part><part><name>p4</name>=<value> sizeX: [[Number]] in meters
</value></part><part><name>p5</name>=<value> sizeY: [[Number]] in meters

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Location]]
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_location = [[createLocation]] [<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/></ext>[[Location#Location Types|"NameVillage"]] , [4035,2151,10], 100, 100];</code>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>_location = [[createLocation]] [<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/></ext>[[Location#Location Types|"NameVillage"]] , [4035,2151,10], 30, 30];
_location [[setText]] "Player town";</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[setText]], [[nearestLocation]], [[nearestLocations]], [[locationPosition]], [[nearestLocationWithDubbing]], [[setRectangular]], [[rectangular]], [[size]]
</value></part></template>
